GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/recipes.description: serves an array of all recipes

DELETE /api/users/:user_id/recipes/:reci.description: deletes the recipe with the specified recipe_id and serves a 204 status code with no content

DELETE /users/:user_id/favourites/:recip.description: deletes the recipe with the specified recipe_id and serves a 204 status code with no content
